About Us

We are a local non-profit helping people to become passionate about the outdoors. Each of us has a specific outdoors passion that has helped us balance our lives and become more well-rounded. Our mission is to help people develop their passion through experiencing the outdoors.

Our Mission

Instill Passion

Establish a Community

Build Self-Confidence

Get Involved!

Contact Us

Subscribe to our mailing list

We are always looking for people to come and share their story and passion with others to help them develop confidence, discover themselves and find a new passion that they love.
